title: Myth Matrix

creator: Sun Pengfei
descriptionHtml: This is a strategy card battle game, with the background story of various myths.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Ladder system is available now! There’re different ranks on the Ladder: Stag, Raven, Wolf, Goat, Voodoo, Dwarf, Undead, Orc, Elf, Demon. You can gain stars from winning in battles to rank up on the Ladder. When you reached Demon rank, Trophies will be used to show your battle skill.
2. UI optimizations on wide screens.
3. Coming soon: Rewards for Ladder rankings. Note: Ranking up on Ladder in current version won’t let you miss any rewards in the coming version.

title: Myth Matrix

creator: Sun Pengfei
descriptionHtml:
This is a strategy card battle game, with the background of various myths, legends, and stories.

On the basis of traditional strategy card battle games, it adds many innovative and fun mechanisms. For example, a board with terrains, on which you can summon minions. And traps, which your opponent can’t see where they’re but have to guess the safe places to summon their minions. Or maybe they would trigger the traps intentionally to prevent your minions getting buffs for having those traps.

Please join our Discord to discuss and talk to the author, and you can invite others for a match here. discord.gg/sURPfcegQb

Twitter @SunPengfei51
Facebook @arthursun51

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Lots of free diamonds are added into rank rewards system.
2. New players now get a lot more of new cards and decks in all classes for free.
3. New player guide system is available now.
4. Dragging gestures is supported now when editing decks.
5. UI optimizations and bug fixes.

If you enjoy Myth Matrix, please leave a nice review on the store, thank you!

title: Myth Matrix

creator: Sun Pengfei
descriptionHtml:
I made this game all by myself. Yes, it is a real online PvP card battle game, I’ve finally managed to made it, congrats to myself :) Due to the love of traditional card battle games and to lower the learning curve, I adopted the very basic rules, and added lots of innovative and fun features and cards that I’ve fantasized. For example, a board with slots, Terrain system, Trap mechanism, and fun keywords such as Spy, Melee, Ranged, etc. I’ll keep updating new and fun stuff (lots of works are planned). If you find this game enjoyable, please share with others and leave a good review. It’s very helpful to a real indie developer. Much obliged!

Also I should apologize for the card design looking too similar to another famous card game. I should have given more thoughts on it in the first place, can’t change it now without a lot of works. Maybe I should change it in the future, after finishing all the planned new cards and features.

If you’ve also fantasized new cards or features, you’re welcomed to share your imaginations and other feedbacks. Also need help in promotion and art. Talk to me and find other players on:

Email: arthursun51@outlook.com
discord.gg/sURPfcegQb
Twitter @MythMatrixEng
Facebook @MythMatrixEng

Shoutout for Komar, who’s helped me with Polish translation.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. 2 new Neutral minion cards are added, “Faceless Hugger” and “Cyborg Archer”. Both cards have effect that is related to attack distance. And this mechanism is closely connected to the next new class feature. Stay tuned :)
2. Bug fixes.

If you enjoy Myth Matrix, please leave a nice review on the store, thank you!

discord.gg/sURPfcegQb
Twitter @MythMatrixEng
Facebook @MythMatrixEng

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. A new column has been added into battle field, changing it from 4x6 to 5x6.
2. Hero enters battle field now.
3. UI optimizations.

Heroes in battle field will have lots of interesting chemical reactions with mechanisms such as Traps, Melee, Terrain, range related effects, etc. If you got any interesting ideas, please share your thoughts with me and other players, thanks!

If you enjoy Myth Matrix, please leave a nice review on the store, thank you!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
It’s been over a month since last update. I’ve finally completed the development of level map!

In this level map, lots of puzzle levels are added. On one side these levels are fun, and on the other side, these levels are designed to show you some combo cards, so you could get familiar that which cards are powerful when played together. I hope it would bring you inspirations to create your unique deck.

I’ll continue to add more tutorials, challenges and rewards into this level map.

For example, a board with slots, Terrain system, Trap mechanism, and fun keywords such as Spy, Melee, Ranged, etc. I’ll keep updating new and fun stuff (lots of works are planned). If you find this game enjoyable, please share with others and leave a good review. It’s very helpful to a real indie developer. Much obliged!

Also I should apologize for the card design looking too similar to another famous card game. I should have given more thoughts on it in the first place, can’t change it now without a lot of works. Maybe I should change it in the future, after finishing all the planned new cards and features.

If you’ve also fantasized new cards or features, you’re welcomed to share your imaginations and other feedbacks. Also need help in promotion and art. Talk to me and find other players on:

Email: arthursun51@outlook.com
discord.gg/sURPfcegQb
Twitter @MythMatrixEng
Facebook @MythMatrixEng

Shoutout for Komar, who’s helped me with Polish translation.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
UI optimizations and bug fixes.
If you enjoy Myth Matrix, please leave a nice review on the store, thank you!

Facebook @MythMatrixEng

For example, a board with slots, Terrain system, Trap mechanism, and fun keywords such as Spy, Melee, Ranged, etc. I’ll keep updating new and fun stuff (lots of works are planned). If you find this game enjoyable, please share with others and leave a good review. It’s very helpful to a real indie developer. Much obliged!

Talk to me and find other players on Discord:
discord.gg/sURPfcegQb

Shoutout for Komar, who’s helped me with Polish translation.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Add new keyword “Choose and play” and 2 new cards “Snowpeak Adventurer” and “Conscription”.
2. Change rendering pipeline from SRP to URP, and add bloom effect.
3. Last words related bug fix and other bug fixes.

If you enjoy Myth Matrix, please leave a positive review. Thank you!
